title: Connection Issues
body: I can't seem to log in to LoL client. After I attempt to log in i keep getting Connection failure: unable to connect to the pvp.net server. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: If going over every step in the guide hasn't help, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this and find out what's going wrong!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs for context, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll respond asap!

You said my ticket will be responded to asap sorry for bugging but today is my only day off of work for a while and i really wanted to play. Last game i played was around 1 a.m and when i tried logging on at 8 a.m (mst) I couldn't. just a 7 hour difference. Anyways, Porocles, any chance you could look into this real quick, If possible. Thanks.
Okay i submitted a ticket with hextech repair tool logs, thanks.

It seems that your network is having problems establishing a connection with the login server, which would result in that error.  If you're still experiencing this, check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and fix this for good.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I've tried all the solutions recommended and it still hasn't helped.
